label: About
text: ARB Apps If any rules are violated or for any suggestions please send an email to arbandroidapps@gmail.com Suggestions 2. While doing calculations each value is rounded to the nearest integer. 1. As all the values are considered as integers the maximum value can be entered is 2147483647 (2^31 - 1). If total income exceeds the limit Rs. 2147483647 (2^31 - 1) then tax will be approximately 30% of the total income. Limitations of the App Calculate the Income Tax for the Current Financial Year 2017-2018 (Assessment Year: 2018-2019). For quick tax calculations a quick tax calculator is provided. FY 2017-2018/AY 2018-2019 Current FY Income Tax Calculator for India About Me
